rows.label: bf09250100_0010
rows.name: ...Hey, you!

rows.label: bf09250100_0020
rows.name:
You wouldn't happen to be Ornella's
former Blade, would you?

rows.label: bf09250100_0030
rows.name: Ornella? No, I'm...

rows.label: bf09250100_0040
rows.name: From the Territorial Defense Corps! It's you!

rows.label: bf09250100_0050
rows.name: What?

rows.label: bf09250100_0060
rows.name:
Ooh, I remember 'em well! Even though I was
knee-high to a grasshopper back then...

rows.label: bf09250100_0070
rows.name:
With that sword slung across your back...
You were so cool.

rows.label: bf09250100_0080
rows.name:
If you hadn't come when you did,
our village would've been...

rows.label: bf09250100_0090
rows.name: Oh yes!

rows.label: bf09250100_0100
rows.name:
The house you used to live in
is still out there on the outskirts.

rows.label: bf09250100_0110
rows.name: House?

rows.label: bf09250100_0130
rows.name:
This long war for independence
will soon come to an end.

rows.label: bf09250100_0140
rows.name: It is not only the war that will soon be over.

rows.label: bf09250100_0150
rows.name: ...Her life, too, is about to end.

rows.label: bf09250100_0160
rows.name: And when she meets her end, so too will I.

rows.label: bf09250100_0170
rows.name:
Unsullied by her death, I will
merely return to my core...

rows.label: bf09250100_0180
rows.name: to await my eventual reawakening.

rows.label: bf09250100_0190
rows.name: I will sleep, as at the end of any other day.

rows.label: bf09250100_0200
rows.name: When I awake, will I be the same person as before?

rows.label: bf09250100_0210
rows.name: If God does indeed exist, I wish I could ask him...

rows.label: bf09250100_0220
rows.name: Who am I, truly?

rows.label: bf09250100_0230
rows.name: Whence did I come, whither am I headed?

rows.label: bf09250100_0240
rows.name:
If I were a praying man,
I'd pray this journal finds its way to you.

rows.label: bf09250100_0250
rows.name:
Trusting that it will,
I will use these last words to pass down...

rows.label: bf09250100_0260
rows.name:
a means of carving the bond between
myself and my partner into this flesh.

rows.label: bf09250100_0270
rows.name: This is how it is done...

rows.label: bf09250100_0275
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]ADLIB

rows.label: bf09250100_0280
rows.name: My... How terribly desolate...

rows.label: bf09250100_0290
rows.name: I heard it's been 90 years, but...

rows.label: bf09250100_0300
rows.name:
What is it?
Did you remember something?

rows.label: bf09250100_0310
rows.name: N-no... It's nothing.

rows.label: bf09250100_0320
rows.name:
Really? That's too bad.
I would've liked to have learned about the old you.

rows.label: bf09250100_0330
rows.name:
I am...who I am.
I do not change.
